ChunkText: if your passport does not give a first name or a last name, we would recommend that you consider adjusting your passport if this is an option for you.
ContextBefore: it is also best to carry your financial documents, proving your financial support, and your sevis fee receipt. you should be prepared to answer similar questions to the visa interview tips below at the border. visa application tips: carefully enter all information concerning your name and personal information so that it matches your passport.
ContextAfter: naming conventions in the US assume an individual will have a first and last name, so not having these will make official matters such as working and driving in the US more complicated for you. its much easier to make this change before leaving your country rather than after arriving in the us.
